title: Excels: Planner and Statement of Expenditure
Spiking Neural Network Drone
description: Our team spearheads a project targeting the implementation of a Spiking Neural Network (SNN) to autonomously control a Crazyflie drone. Leveraging Evolutionary Optimization for Neuromorphic Systems (EONS), we develop and train the neural network through simulation, paving the way for seamless hardware integration.
